pages.title: Dark Ore
pages.text: In the overworld this ore is rare and thus precious, but nothing stops you from searching other realms. It lurks deep underground in the darkest corners of the planet. After lying in darkness for ages, it now radiates it. Standing on the block clouds your vision.
Now you only need to decide whether to break it or smelt it as is.

pages.title: Piece of Darkness
pages.text: It seems darkness itself has taken shape and now rests in your hands. This is what normally drops from dark ore. These fragments react especially well with gold.
